dark"><p>Building a website with React and JavaScript to decide what to eat, similar to the wheel in the picture you provided, is definitely possible. Here's a high-level approach on how you can implement this:</p><ol><li><p><strong>Setup Your Project:</strong></p><ul><li>Create a new React app using <code>create-react-app</code>.</li><li>Setup your project structure with components for the wheel, the event list, and the main app container.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Design the Wheel:</strong></p><ul><li>Use SVG or a canvas element to draw the wheel.</li><li>Divide the wheel into equal segments based on the number of choices.</li><li>Add labels to each segment with the food options.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Create the Event List:</strong></p><ul><li>Design a list component that takes inputs and allows for deletion.</li><li>Each list item should be connected to a segment on the wheel.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Spinning Logic:</strong></p><ul><li>Implement the spinning logic with JavaScript using a button to trigger a spin.</li><li>Use CSS animations or JavaScript to rotate the wheel.</li><li>Determine the stopping point to select the food.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Interactivity:</strong></p><ul><li>Allow users to add new events (food choices) through an input field.</li><li>Update the wheel dynamically as new choices are added or removed.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Result Display:</strong></p><ul><li>After the wheel stops spinning, display the result in a designated area.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Styling:</strong></p><ul><li>Use CSS to style your components to match the design in your picture.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>State Management:</strong></p><ul><li>Manage the state of the wheel and list using React state or a state management library like Redux if necessary.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Responsiveness:</strong></p><ul><li>Make sure your app is responsive and works on various screen sizes.</li></ul></li><li><p><strong>Deployment:</strong></p><ul><li>Deploy your site using a service like Vercel, Netlify, or GitHub Pages.</li></ul></li></ol><p>Here's a sample of what your main App I can help you write a basic version of the <code>App</code> component for your React app. This will be a functional component with hooks for managing the state. It won't include the full implementation of the wheel spinning logic or the complete styles, but it will give you a structure to start from.</p><p>Here is a simple <code>App</code> component that includes the ability to add and remove events, and a placeholder for the wheel that will show the selected event:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">React</span>, { useState } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'react'</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">App</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> [events, setEvents] = <span class="hljs-title function_">useState</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'Pizza'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'Ice Cream'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'Sushi'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'Dumplings'</span>]);
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> [newEvent, setNewEvent] = <span class="hljs-title function_">useState</span>(<span class="hljs-string">''</span>);
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> [selectedEvent, setSelectedEvent] = <span class="hljs-title function_">useState</span>(<span class="hljs-string">''</span>);

  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">addEvent</span> = (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) =&gt; {
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (newEvent) {
      <span class="hljs-title function_">setEvents</span>([...events, newEvent]);
      <span class="hljs-title function_">setNewEvent</span>(<span class="hljs-string">''</span>);
    }
  };

  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">removeEvent</span> = (<span class="hljs-params">eventIndex</span>) =&gt; {
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> updatedEvents = events.<span class="hljs-title function_">filter</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">_, index</span>) =&gt;</span> index !== eventIndex);
    <span class="hljs-title function_">setEvents</span>(updatedEvents);
  };

  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">spinWheel</span> = (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) =&gt; {
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> randomIndex = <span class="hljs-title class_">Math</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">floor</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">Math</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">random</span>() * events.<span class="hljs-property">length</span>);
    <span class="hljs-title function_">setSelectedEvent</span>(events[randomIndex]);
  };

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"text"</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{newEvent}</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">onChange</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{(e)</span> =&gt;</span> setNewEvent(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Enter new event"
      /&gt;
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span> <span class="hljs-attr">onClick</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{addEvent}</span>&gt;</span>Add<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
        {events.map((event, index) =&gt; (
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>&gt;</span>
            {event}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span> <span class="hljs-attr">onClick</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{()</span> =&gt;</span> removeEvent(index)}&gt;Remove<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
        ))}
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span> <span class="hljs-attr">onClick</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{spinWheel}</span>&gt;</span>Spin the Wheel<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>Result: {selectedEvent}<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  );
}

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>;
</code></div></div></pre><p>This code provides you with:</p><ul><li>An input field to add new events to the wheel.</li><li>A button to add the entered event to the list of events.</li><li>A list that displays all the events with a button to remove an event from the list.</li><li>A button to spin the wheel, which randomly selects an event from the list and displays it as the result.</li></ul><p>You'll need to create separate components or add functionality for the visual wheel representation and animation. This can get quite complex if you're new to React, as it might involve using canvas or SVG graphics and possibly some third-party libraries for animations.</p><p>Remember to install React and create a new React app if you haven't already:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>sh</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-sh">npx create-react-app my-eating-decision-app

This includes styling for the input field, buttons, the event list, and the result display.</p><p>Please add this CSS to your <code>App.css</code> or equivalent stylesheet in your React project:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-comment">/* General App styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">body</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-family</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'Arial'</span>, sans-serif;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f7f7f7</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Container for the whole App */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.App</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-align</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding-top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50px</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Input field styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[type=<span class="hljs-string">"text"</span>]</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#ddd</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200px</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Button styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#007bff</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">cursor</span>: pointer;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transition</span>: background-color <span class="hljs-number">0.3s</span> ease;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#0056b3</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Event list styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">ul</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">list-style-type</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">li</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-bottom</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">2px</span> <span class="hljs-number">4px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.1</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span>: space-between;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span>: center;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">li</span> <span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#dc3545</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">li</span> <span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#bd2130</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Result display styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.result</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">24px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#333</span>;
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>Here's how you can use this CSS in your React component:</p><ol><li>Ensure that the root element in your <code>App.js</code> has the class name <code>App</code>. This will apply the central alignment and padding to your app.</li><li>Add class names to your elements in the <code>App.js</code> to match the CSS selectors. For example, add <code>className="result"</code> to your result div.</li></ol><p>Please adjust the styles as needed to fit the design you have in mind. class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p>Creating a spinning wheel in JSX and CSS can be quite advanced, but I'll provide a simplified version that you can use as a starting point. This will be a basic wheel that you can style further and enhance as needed.</p><p>First, let's create the JSX for the wheel. We will use a <code>div</code> for each segment of the wheel, and transform it with CSS to create the pie-like segments:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">React</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'react'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./Wheel.css'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// Make sure to import the CSS for the wheel</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">Wheel</span> = (<span class="hljs-params">{ events, spinWheel, selectedEvent }</span>) =&gt; {
  <span class="hljs-comment">// Calculate the rotation degree for each segment based on the number of events</span>
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> segmentDegrees = <span class="hljs-number">360</span> / events.<span class="hljs-property">length</span>;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-container"</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel"</span>&gt;</span>
        {events.map((event, index) =&gt; (
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-segment"</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * <span class="hljs-attr">segmentDegrees</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>) <span class="hljs-attr">skewY</span>(<span class="hljs-attr">-30deg</span>)`,
              <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">hsl</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * (<span class="hljs-attr">360</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">events.length</span>)}, <span class="hljs-attr">70</span>%, <span class="hljs-attr">50</span>%)` // <span class="hljs-attr">Color</span> <span class="hljs-attr">segments</span> <span class="hljs-attr">differently</span>
            }}
          &gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>&gt;</span>{event}<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
        ))}
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"spin-button"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">onClick</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{spinWheel}</span>&gt;</span>Spin the Wheel<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"result"</span>&gt;</span>Result: {selectedEvent}<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  );
}

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Wheel</span>;
</code></div></div></pre><p>And here is the CSS for the wheel (<code>Wheel.css</code>):</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-container</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust size as needed */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust size as needed */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> auto;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.segment-content</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">bottom</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust based on size of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1.2em</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">skewY</span>(<span class="hljs-number">30deg</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">90deg</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">white-space</span>: nowrap;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.spin-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* Add more styles as needed */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.result</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">24px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* Add more styles as needed */</span>
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>This code will create a static wheel divided into colored segments with the event names. Each segment is skewed and rotated to create the pie-like effect. The colors are generated using HSL with evenly distributed hues for variety.</p><p>To create the spinning effect, you would add an animation to the <code>.wheel</code> class. However, for a simple demo, the wheel does not actually spin. The use of HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) was intended to distribute colors evenly, but if it didn't work as expected, we might need to adjust the calculations.</p></li></ol><p>Here's a revised version of the CSS that should give you a better wheel:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-comment">/* Rest of your CSS */</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Wheel styling */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {

  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">16px</span> solid transparent; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust the border to change the thickness of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> auto <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::before</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;

  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust to change the size of the inner circle */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust to change the size of the inner circle */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: white; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Color of the inner circle */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>);
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">clip-path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">polygon</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: red; <span class="hljs-comment">/* This will be overwritten by inline styles */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">calc</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--segment-index) * <span class="hljs-number">1turn</span> / <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--total-segments)));
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.segment-content</span> {

  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translateX</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">calc</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--segment-index) * -<span class="hljs-number">1turn</span> / <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--total-segments)));

              '<span class="hljs-attr">--segment-index</span>'<span class="hljs-attr">:</span> <span class="hljs-attr">index</span>,
              '<span class="hljs-attr">--total-segments</span>'<span class="hljs-attr">:</span> <span class="hljs-attr">totalSegments</span>,

            }}
          &gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>&gt;</span>{event}<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>

        ))}

<span class="hljs-comment">// ... Rest of your component exports</span>
</code></div></div></pre><p>In this revised version, we use CSS custom properties (<code>--segment-index</code> and <code>--total-segments</code>) to calculate the rotation for each segment. data-message-id="12426ccc-4948-4040-9ea1-61ae44403a4a" class="min-h-[20px] text-message flex flex-col items-start gap-3 whitespace-pre-wrap break-words [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5 overflow-x-auto"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p>The image shows a wheel that indeed resembles a shuriken, likely due to incorrect CSS styling. To get a proper circular wheel with segments, you will need to use a different approach for the CSS. Also, the add button issue could be due to a styling problem where the button might be blending into the background or not rendering correctly.</p><p>Let's tackle these issues one by one:</p><h3>Fixing the Wheel</h3><p>To create a circular wheel, you can use the <code>border-radius</code> property to make it round and then use <code>clip-path</code> or <code>transform</code> to create the segments.</p><p>Here's a revised approach to create a circular wheel:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* This ensures the wheel is circular */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> auto;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Ensures nothing spills outside the wheel */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Pivot point at the bottom center */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Ensures nothing spills outside the segment */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjusts the ::after pseudo-element to create the segments */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::after</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Inherits the background color of the segment */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Double the width to cover an entire half */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Double the height to cover an entire half */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-number">45deg</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">/* Adjust the degree for more segments */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>This CSS assumes that you have a container <code>.wheel</code> with child elements <code>.wheel-segment</code>. The <code>::after</code> pseudo-element is used to create segments within the <code>.wheel-segment</code>.</p><h3>Fixing the Add Button</h3><p>If the Add button next to "Enter new event" is invisible, it's likely a CSS issue. Ensure that the button has a background color that contrasts with the page and that it's not hidden due to overlapping elements or display issues.</p><p>Here's an example CSS for a visible button:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#007bff</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* A bright blue color */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">cursor</span>: pointer;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transition</span>: background-color <span class="hljs-number">0.3s</span> ease;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* Other styles as needed */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#0056b3</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* A darker blue on hover */</span>
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>Apply this CSS to your Add button to ensure it is visible. If it's still not showing, check for any other CSS rules that might be hiding the button or for any JavaScript that might be manipulating its style or presence in the DOM.</p><p>To proceed, you should correct the CSS for the wheel segments to ensure they form a circle rather than a star-like shape and adjust the button's CSS to make it visible. class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p>To divide the wheel into equal slices that correspond to the number of events and to ensure the Add button is always visible, we'll need to adjust both the CSS for the wheel and the button.</p><h3>CSS for the Wheel Slices</h3><p>To create equal slices for the wheel, we will use the <code>:nth-child</code> pseudo-class to set the background color and create a "pie" effect. Each slice will be a segment of a circle using the <code>border-radius</code> property. Here's a CSS example that creates equal slices based on the number of items:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Makes the wheel round */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span> auto; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Center the wheel with margin */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">clip-path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">polygon</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">/* Clip-path for the pie effect */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">clip-path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">polygon</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* You will need to dynamically set the background color and transform rotation based on the number of events in your JavaScript */</span>
</code></div></div></pre><p>For the dynamic part (setting the background color and rotation), you would use inline styles within your React component:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx">{
  events.<span class="hljs-title function_">map</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">event, index</span>) =&gt;</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>

        <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * (<span class="hljs-attr">360</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">events.length</span>)}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`, // <span class="hljs-attr">This</span> <span class="hljs-attr">rotates</span> <span class="hljs-attr">each</span> <span class="hljs-attr">segment</span>

Here's an example:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.add-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#007bff</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Non-transparent background color */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">cursor</span>: pointer;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transition</span>: background-color <span class="hljs-number">0.3s</span> ease;
}

apologize for any confusion. If the Add button is only appearing when the mouse hovers over it, it's possible that there may be other CSS rules that are causing it to be invisible under normal circumstances, such as <code>opacity</code>, <code>visibility</code>, or a color that blends into the background.</p><p>Let's ensure that the button is styled with a solid, contrasting color and no transparency to make it visible at all times:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.add-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#007bff</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* A solid, bright blue color */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">cursor</span>: pointer;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transition</span>: background-color <span class="hljs-number">0.3s</span> ease;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">visibility</span>: visible; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Override any inherited visibility settings */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Override any inherited opacity settings */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.add-button</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#0056b3</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* A darker blue on hover */</span>
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>Make sure this CSS class is specifically applied to your Add button:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx">&lt;button className=<span class="hljs-string">"add-button"</span>&gt;<span class="hljs-title class_">Add</span>&lt;/button&gt;
</code></div></div></pre><p>For the wheel, let's create an updated and corrected CSS that will ensure we have a circular wheel divided into equal colored segments:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Makes the wheel round */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span> auto; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Center the wheel with margin */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">clip-path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">polygon</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* The background and transform will be set in React inline styles */</span>
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Ensure the content of each segment is rotated to be readable */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.segment-content</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--rotate));
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>And here's how you can apply the styles within your React component:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx">{
  events.<span class="hljs-title function_">map</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">event, index</span>) =&gt;</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
      <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>
      <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-segment"</span>
      <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">background:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">hsl</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * (<span class="hljs-attr">360</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">events.length</span>)}, <span class="hljs-attr">70</span>%, <span class="hljs-attr">50</span>%)`,
        <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * (<span class="hljs-attr">360</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">events.length</span>)}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`,
        '<span class="hljs-attr">--rotate</span>'<span class="hljs-attr">:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">-</span>${<span class="hljs-attr">index</span> * (<span class="hljs-attr">360</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">events.length</span>)}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>`, // <span class="hljs-attr">For</span> <span class="hljs-attr">the</span> <span class="hljs-attr">text</span> <span class="hljs-attr">to</span> <span class="hljs-attr">cancel</span> <span class="hljs-attr">out</span> <span class="hljs-attr">the</span> <span class="hljs-attr">rotation</span> <span class="hljs-attr">of</span> <span class="hljs-attr">the</span> <span class="hljs-attr">segment</span>
      }}
    &gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>&gt;</span>{event}<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  ))
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>This code assumes that you have a structure where <code>.wheel</code> is the container for <code>.wheel-segment</code> elements, which represent the slices of the wheel, and <code>.segment-content</code> is used to position the text inside each segment.</p><p>Ensure this updated code replaces your current CSS and JSX implementations for the wheel and the button. If the button still remains invisible, you might want to check for any JavaScript that might be manipulating its style at runtime or any global styles that might be conflicting with the button's <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./Wheel.css'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// Make sure the CSS file is named Wheel.css and is in the same directory</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">Wheel</span> = (<span class="hljs-params">{ events }</span>) =&gt; {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> numberOfEvents = events.<span class="hljs-property">length</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> segmentAngle = <span class="hljs-number">360</span> / numberOfEvents;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel"</span>&gt;</span>
      {events.map((event, index) =&gt; {
        const rotateAngle = segmentAngle * index;
        const skewAngle = 90 - segmentAngle;

        return (
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-segment"</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">rotateAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>) <span class="hljs-attr">skewY</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">skewAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`,
              <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">hsl</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">rotateAngle</span>}, <span class="hljs-attr">70</span>%, <span class="hljs-attr">50</span>%)`
            }}
          &gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> 
              <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
                <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">skewY</span>(<span class="hljs-attr">-</span>${<span class="hljs-attr">skewAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>) <span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">segmentAngle</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">2</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`
              }}
            &gt;</span>
              {event}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
        );
      })}
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  );
};

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Wheel</span>;
</code></div></div></pre><p>Now for the CSS (<code>Wheel.css</code>):</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {

class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p>To have different colors for each slice and to place the event name correctly within each slice, you'll need to adjust the <code>Wheel.jsx</code> and the associated <code>Wheel.css</code> files. Here's how you can modify the <code>Wheel.jsx</code> to include dynamic coloring and proper placement of event names:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">React</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'react'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./Wheel.css'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// Ensure you have the Wheel.css in the correct path</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">Wheel</span> = (<span class="hljs-params">{ events }</span>) =&gt; {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> numberOfSlices = events.<span class="hljs-property">length</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> sliceDegrees = <span class="hljs-number">360</span> / numberOfSlices;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel"</span>&gt;</span>
      {events.map((event, index) =&gt; {
        // Calculate the rotation for each slice and its color
        const rotateAngle = sliceDegrees * index;
        const backgroundColor = `hsl(${index * (360 / numberOfSlices)}, 70%, 50%)`;

        return (
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-segment"</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">rotateAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`,
              <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor:</span> <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor</span>,
            }}
          &gt;</span>
            {/* Rotating the text back to undo the rotation of the slice */}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> 
              <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
                <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-attr">-</span>${<span class="hljs-attr">rotateAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`
              }}
            &gt;</span>
              {event}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
        );
      })}
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  );
};

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Wheel</span>;
</code></div></div></pre><p>In the <code>Wheel.css</code> file, you can use the following styles to create a circular wheel and rotate each segment correctly:</p><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> auto;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;  <span class="hljs-comment">/* Half the diameter of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Full height to reach the center */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;   <span class="hljs-comment">/* Start from the center of the wheel */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Set the origin of transform at the left center */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">300px</span> <span class="hljs-number">300px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Round only the far side */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.segment-content</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">100%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Pull the content back into the visible slice */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* Double the width to allow content to be centered */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: bold;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1em</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
}
</code></div></div></pre><p>This <code>Wheel.css</code> will create a circular wheel and each <code>.wheel-segment</code> will be a half-circle rotated from the center to create slices. The <code>.segment-content</code> is positioned to be readable and centered within each slice. The <code>backgroundColor</code> is dynamically set in <code>Wheel.jsx</code> to give each segment a unique color.</p><p>Please add these updates to your <code>Wheel.jsx</code> and <code>Wheel.css</code>, and it should display a colored wheel with the event names in each segment.</p></div></div></div><div class="mt-1 flex justify-start gap-3 empty:hidden"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p>It looks like there are a couple of issues with the wheel's segments and the placement of the text. Here's how you can address them:</p><ol><li><p><strong>Incorrect Number of Colors</strong>: It seems that the wheel isn't creating a segment for each event. This might be because of the way the segments are being calculated or styled. We need to make sure that the <code>rotate</code> and <code>background-color</code> styles are being applied correctly for each segment.</p></li><li><p><strong>Text Clustering</strong>: The text for each segment is not positioned correctly within the slices. We need to adjust the positioning and rotation of the text so it's placed correctly within each segment.</p></li></ol><p>Let's refactor the <code>Wheel.jsx</code> and the CSS to ensure that each event gets its own segment and the text is readable:</p><h3><code>Wheel.jsx</code></h3><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>jsx</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-jsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">React</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'react'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./Wheel.css'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// Ensure you have the Wheel.css in the correct path</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">Wheel</span> = (<span class="hljs-params">{ events }</span>) =&gt; {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> numberOfSlices = events.<span class="hljs-property">length</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> sliceDegrees = <span class="hljs-number">360</span> / numberOfSlices;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel"</span>&gt;</span>
      {events.map((event, index) =&gt; {
        // Calculate the rotation for each slice
        const rotateAngle = sliceDegrees * index;
        // Set a different color for each segment
        const backgroundColor = `hsl(${rotateAngle}, 70%, 50%)`;

        return (
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{index}</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"wheel-segment"</span>
            <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">rotateAngle</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`,
              <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor:</span> <span class="hljs-attr">backgroundColor</span>,
            }}
          &gt;</span>
            {/* Position the text at the outer edge of the segment */}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> 
              <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"segment-content"</span>
              <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">{{</span>
                <span class="hljs-attr">transform:</span> `<span class="hljs-attr">rotate</span>(${<span class="hljs-attr">sliceDegrees</span> / <span class="hljs-attr">2</span>}<span class="hljs-attr">deg</span>)`
              }}
            &gt;</span>
              {event}
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
        );
      })}
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
  );
};

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Wheel</span>;
</code></div></div></pre><h3><code>Wheel.css</code></h3><pre><div class="bg-black rounded-md"><div class="flex items-center relative text-gray-200 bg-gray-800 dark:bg-token-surface-primary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-md"><span>css</span><button class="flex gap-1 items-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 4C10.8954 4 10 4.89543 10 6H14C14 4.89543 13.1046 4 12 4ZM8.53513 4C9.22675 2.8044 10.5194 2 12 2C13.4806 2 14.7733 2.8044 15.4649 4H17C18.6569 4 20 5.34315 20 7V19C20 20.6569 18.6569 22 17 22H7C5.34315 22 4 20.6569 4 19V7C4 5.34315 5.34315 4 7 4H8.53513ZM8 6H7C6.44772 6 6 6.44772 6 7V19C6 19.5523 6.44772 20 7 20H17C17.5523 20 18 19.5523 18 19V7C18 6.44772 17.5523 6 17 6H16C16 7.10457 15.1046 8 14 8H10C8.89543 8 8 7.10457 8 6Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div><div class="p-4 overflow-y-auto"><code class="!whitespace-pre hljs language-css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> auto;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">300px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wheel-segment</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">clip-path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">polygon</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
}

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.segment-content</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform-origin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: bold;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: white;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1em</span>;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* This positions the text correctly */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">translateX</span>(<span class="hljs-number">40%</span>) <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">90deg</span>);
